summary: Four friends are attacked by a demon while on a picnic, due to possession of a tome of mystic information. Told in flashbacks by the sole survivor.
cast: Edward Connell|Barbara Hewitt|Frank Bonner|Robin Christopher|Jack Woods|James Phillips|Fritz Leiber Jr.|Patrick Burke|Jim Duron|Forrest J. Ackerman|Norvelle Brooks|Louis Clayton|Jim Danforth|Sharon Gray|Jack H. Harris|Irving L. Lichtenstein|Chuck Niles|R.J. Robertson
keywords: giant ape|psychotronic film|tape recorder|vehicle driving by itself|object made of human skin

title: Equinox
